title: Reminder if you were a somebody on Miscellaneous
body:
You're now a nobody here on GD

Miscellaneous was a dead board, you know it to be true so don't be delusional about it now, and it's dead carcass has been consumed and merged into GD

Get used to it and don't dwell about it

Then be welcomed by us which we'll do with open arms if you give us the chance and work hard to become that somebody that you were for the better or worse once again

So Miscellaneous stragglers...

Welcome to GD
